definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Destroying block will lose all saved energy</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="block_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bat</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="block_energy_get"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
